string.text: Threaded barrel
Swap the barrel with an extended variant that has threads pre-cut for mounting a suppressor.
Barrel with modified rifling pitch
Changing the rifling pitch in the barrel can improve muzzle velocity for a flatter bullet trajectory.
Protective coating
The application of a special coating to the moving components can significantly reduce the amount of wear they receive.
Install a hardened extractor
Improves overall reliability of the weapon by reducing the number of common ejection issues that can occur after firing.
Ergonomic grip
Installation of a more comfortable grip.
Soft trigger release
Reduces recoil, which in turn leads to more accurate follow-up shots.
High-capacity magazine (13 rounds)
Replace the standard magazine with a modern alternative, which has a slightly larger capacity due to the compact layout.
Chamber alignment
Careful fitment of parts and minimization of backlash in the chamber for a better seal, improving accuracy.
Balance the bolt group
Balancing of the bolt group components reduces the barrel's departure from line of sight when firing, and also reduces perceived recoil by the shooter.
Lightweight alloy components
Replacing standard parts with lightweight alloys significantly reduces the weight of the gun.
Tritium inserts
Installation of luminous night-sights allows for easier target acquisition in low-light conditions.
Reinforced trigger assembly
A refined trigger assembly allows for a faster rate of fire at the expense of some overall reliability.
Recoil compensator
Reduces recoil, which in turn leads to more accurate follow-up shots.
Barrel alignment
Calibrate barrel alignment with the sights and remove any excessive movement that occurs during the firing cycle.
Combined tactical module
Combines the functions of a narrow-field tactical flashlight and laser sight. Particularly useful in low-light conditions.
Reinforced frame
Replace the standard polymer frame with a lightweight alloy equivalent, increasing durability without any difference in weight. Recommended for use with tactical accessories.
Heavy-duty components
Replacing standard parts with analogs made of high-strength alloys increases the weapon's durability.
